scripts.test:allure: npx playwright test --reporter=line,allure-playwright && npm run allure:generate
scripts.docker:test: docker build -t playwright-framework . && docker run --rm --env-file=.env playwright-tests
scripts.allure:generate: rm -rf allure-report && mkdir -p allure-history && cp -r allure-report/history allure-history || true && allure generate --clean allure-results -o allure-report && cp -r allure-history allure-report/history || true
